entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
